summary: This is a replica of "Ice" sword from "Game Of Thrones" TV series.
descriptionHtml:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/13357?][size=6]SSE version byÂ Docjay[/size][/url]

This is a replica of "Ice" sword from "Game Of Thrones" TV series.
"Ice" is a greatsword. You can craft it only at Skyforge. Requires skill Steel smithing and:

[list][*]5 Steel Ingots
[*]5 Leather
[*]2 Leather Strips
[*]1 Firewood
[*]1 Daedra Heart
[/list] [u]For version without sheath you'll need same components, except Leather and Leather Strips
[/u]Characteristics:

Value 1000
Weight 15
Damage 30
Crit Dmg 20

Model and Textures made by me.

Thanks to DoubleBrewski for Greatsword sheaths and scabbards mod

Enjoy =)
